General.Name: Roo Hsing Co Ltd
General.Description: Roo Hsing Co., Ltd engages in the manufacturing, processing, trading, and importing and exporting of knitting, woven, cotton, wool, leather, and other garments in Taiwan. The company processes, sells, imports, and exports garment accessories. It also acts as an agent for domestic and foreign companies for bids, quotes, procurement, and distribution. In addition, the company offers trousers, skirts, dresses, pants, sundresses, shirts, jackets, vests, long shorts, sports suits, masks, and other anti-epidemic products, etc. Further, it engages in electronic component wholesale business, real estate leasing and trading, and funeral home development. The company was formerly known as Roo Hsing Garment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Roo Hsing Co., Ltd. in June 2008. Roo Hsing Co., Ltd was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 57, Fuxing North Road, Taipei, Taiwan
